scripts.test: rm -rf .nyc_output && mkdir -p coverage && USE_MOCKS=1 nyc --silent --no-clean --temp-dir .nyc_output node tests/api-keys.test.js && USE_MOCKS=0 nyc --silent --no-clean --temp-dir .nyc_output node tests/api-keys.test.js && nyc report --temp-dir .nyc_output --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary --reporter=html --report-dir coverage --check-coverage --lines 80 --branches 70 --functions 80 --statements 80
